segment.source: Delete a single site from your global Enterprise Mode site list.
segment.target: Delete a single site from your global Enterprise Mode site list.

segment.source: Delete sites from your Enterprise Mode site list in the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Delete sites from your Enterprise Mode site list in the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Delete sites from your Enterprise Mode site list in the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager
segment.target: Delete sites from your Enterprise Mode site list in the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager

segment.source: Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1 (SP1)
segment.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1 (SP1)

segment.source: To delete a single site from your global Enterprise Mode site list
segment.target: To delete a single site from your global Enterprise Mode site list

segment.source: From the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager, pick the site you want to delete, and then click Delete.
segment.target: From the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager, pick the site you want to delete, and then click Delete.

segment.source: The site is permanently removed from your list.
segment.target: The site is permanently removed from your list.

segment.source: If you delete a site by mistake, you’ll need to manually add it back using the instructions in the following topics, based on operating system.
segment.target: If you delete a site by mistake, you’ll need to manually add it back using the instructions in the following topics, based on operating system.

segment.source: Add sites to the Enterprise Mode site list using the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.2)
segment.target: Add sites to the Enterprise Mode site list using the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.2)

segment.source: Add sites to the Enterprise Mode site list using the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.1)
segment.target: Add sites to the Enterprise Mode site list using the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.1)

segment.source: Download the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.2)
segment.target: Download the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.2)

segment.source: Download the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.1)
segment.target: Download the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager (schema v.1)

segment.source: Use the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager
segment.target: Use the Enterprise Mode Site List Manager
